explains: adj. 贸易保护主义的；保护贸易论的

sentences.en: The administration may be moving away from free trade and toward more protectionist policies.
sentences.cn: 该政府可能正在放弃自由贸易而走向贸易保护主义的政策。

sentences.en: Malaysia and Indonesia rely on open markets for forest and fishery products. Conversely, some Asian countries are highly protectionist.
sentences.cn: 马来西亚和印度尼西亚依靠开放的市场获取林业和渔业产品。与之相反的是，一些亚洲国家是高度的保护贸易论者。

sentences.en: As small countries dependent on foreign markets, they followed a liberal trade policy in the main, though a protectionist movement developed in Sweden.
sentences.cn: 作为依赖外国市场的小国，它们主要奉行自由贸易政策，尽管在瑞典出现了保护主义运动。
